title: Bug 13189 - Refactoring: Deleting fields context menu overridden by message dialog
description:
20020409I on LinuxMotif and w2k:
1. Setup JUnit
2.
OB: Upon refactoring and attempting to delete fields, the context menu is overridden by a message dialog.
SR:
1. Enable the option 'Code GeneratorRemove prefix from field names'
2. Open TestCase.java
3. In the outliner, right-click on 'fName'.
4. [Provide expected behavior here, e.g., Expect the context menu to appear without being overridden by a message dialog.]
